wiki.content: "No Matter What" is a song by rapper T.I. off his 6th studio album, Paper Trail. It was released as a promotional track for the album on April 29, 2008, with its eventual release onto the iTunes store on May 6. The song was nominated at the 2008 MTV Video Music Awards for Best Male Video. The song addresses the rappers resilience and continuance following the tragic deaths of his best friend and daughter from a fatal shooting and miscarriage (respectively) and the legal repercussions of weapons charges in 2007. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
